MtkSnapToGrid.c

00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                              MtkSnapToGrid                                =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR
00009                                MISR Toolkit
00010 
00011             Copyright 2005, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrSetRegion.h"
00018 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrMapQuery.h"
00020 #include "MisrError.h"
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <math.h>
00023 #include <float.h>
00024 
00040 MTKt_status MtkSnapToGrid(
00041   int Path,             
00042   int Resolution,       
00043   MTKt_Region Region,   
00044   MTKt_MapInfo *Map_info  )
00045 {
00046   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00047   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00048   MTKt_MapInfo map = MTKT_MAPINFO_INIT;
00049                 /* Map info structure */
00050   MTKt_SomCoord som_min;    /* Som coordinate */
00051   MTKt_SomCoord som_max;    /* Som coordinate */
00052   MTKt_SomCoord corner;     /* Som coordinate */
00053   MTKt_SomCoord center;     /* Som coordinate */
00054 
00055   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00056   /* Argument check: mapinfo == NULL                                    */
00057   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00058   
00059   if (Map_info == NULL) {
00060     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00061   }
00062 
00063   /* ----------------------- */
00064   /* Set path and resolution */
00065   /* ----------------------- */
00066 
00067   map.path = Path;
00068   map.som.path = Path;
00069   map.resolution = Resolution;
00070   map.resfactor = map.resolution / MAXRESOLUTION;
00071   map.pixelcenter = MTK_TRUE;
00072 
00073   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00074   /* Snap center geo coordinate of region to som grid for this path */
00075   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00076   
00077   status = MtkLatLonToSomXY(Path, Region.geo.ctr.lat, Region.geo.ctr.lon,
00078                 &center.x, &center.y);
00079   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00080 
00081   som_min.x = center.x - Region.hextent.xlat;
00082   som_min.y = center.y - Region.hextent.ylon;
00083   som_max.x = center.x + Region.hextent.xlat;
00084   som_max.y = center.y + Region.hextent.ylon;
00085 
00086   status = MtkBlsToSomXY(Path, MINRESOLUTION, 1, 0, 0, &corner.x, &corner.y);
00087   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00088 
00089   corner.x -= MINRESOLUTION / (double)2.0;
00090   corner.y -= MINRESOLUTION / (double)2.0;
00091   som_min.x = (floor((som_min.x - corner.x) / MINRESOLUTION)) * MINRESOLUTION + corner.x;
00092   som_min.y = (floor((som_min.y - corner.y) / MINRESOLUTION)) * MINRESOLUTION + corner.y;
00093   som_max.x = (ceil((som_max.x - corner.x) / MINRESOLUTION)) * MINRESOLUTION + corner.x;
00094   som_max.y = (ceil((som_max.y - corner.y) / MINRESOLUTION)) * MINRESOLUTION + corner.y;
00095   
00096   map.som.ctr.x = (som_max.x + som_min.x) / 2.0;
00097   map.som.ctr.y = (som_max.y + som_min.y) / 2.0;
00098 
00099   map.nline = (som_max.x - som_min.x) / map.resolution;
00100   map.nsample = (som_max.y - som_min.y) / map.resolution;
00101 
00102   /* ------------------------- */
00103   /* Compute upper left corner */
00104   /* ------------------------- */
00105 
00106   map.som.ulc.x = som_min.x + (map.resolution / (double)2.0);
00107   map.som.ulc.y = som_min.y + (map.resolution / (double)2.0);
00108 
00109   /* --------------------------- */
00110   /* Compute lower right corner  */
00111   /* --------------------------- */
00112 
00113   map.som.lrc.x = som_max.x - (map.resolution / (double)2.0);
00114   map.som.lrc.y = som_max.y - (map.resolution / (double)2.0);
00115 
00116   /* ------------------------------------------- */
00117   /* Compute geographic coordinates for map area */
00118   /* ------------------------------------------- */
00119 
00120   status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(map.som.path, map.som.ulc.x, map.som.ulc.y,
00121                 &map.geo.ulc.lat, &map.geo.ulc.lon);
00122   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00123 
00124   status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(map.som.path, map.som.ulc.x, map.som.lrc.y,
00125                 &map.geo.urc.lat, &map.geo.urc.lon);
00126   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00127 
00128   status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(map.som.path, map.som.ctr.x, map.som.ctr.y,
00129                 &map.geo.ctr.lat, &map.geo.ctr.lon);
00130   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00131 
00132   status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(map.som.path, map.som.lrc.x, map.som.lrc.y,
00133                 &map.geo.lrc.lat, &map.geo.lrc.lon);
00134   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00135 
00136   status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(map.som.path, map.som.lrc.x, map.som.ulc.y,
00137                 &map.geo.llc.lat, &map.geo.llc.lon);
00138   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00139 
00140   /* --------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00141   /* Set the projection parameters in mapinfo for this path and resolution */
00142   /* --------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00143 
00144   status = MtkPathToProjParam(Path, Resolution, &(map.pp));
00145   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00146 
00147   /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00148   /* Determine start block and end block of this map plane */
00149   /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00150 
00151   map.start_block = (int)((map.som.ulc.x - map.pp.ulc[0])/
00152               (map.pp.nline * map.pp.resolution)) + 1;
00153   map.end_block = (int)((map.som.lrc.x - map.pp.ulc[0])/
00154             (map.pp.nline * map.pp.resolution)) + 1;
00155 
00156   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00157   /* Return.                                                            */
00158   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00159 
00160   *Map_info = map;
00161 
00162   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00163 
00164 ERROR_HANDLE:
00165   return status_code;
00166 }
